body_html: I am not sure what you mean by "extra worker". I am assuming that I can use any number of workers to run this example. I tried running it with 2 workers each with 1 GPU and got this error. Is that not a valid setup to run mnist_replica.py?

body: I am not sure what you mean by "extra worker". I am assuming that I can use any number of workers to run this example. I tried running it with 2 workers each with 1 GPU and got this error. Is that not a valid setup to run mnist_replica.py?
